CSI.Name: Cursor Up
CSI.Description: Moves the cursor up by n rows

CSI.Name: Cursor Down
CSI.Description: Moves the cursor down by n rows

CSI.Name: Cursor Forward
CSI.Description: Moves the cursor forward by n columns

CSI.Name: Cursor Backward
CSI.Description: Moves the cursor backward by n columns

CSI.Name: Cursor Position
CSI.Description: Moves the cursor to the specified position

CSI.Name: Erase in Display
CSI.Description: Clears part of the screen based on n

CSI.Name: Erase in Line
CSI.Description: Clears part of the current line based on n

CSI.Name: Select Graphic Rendition
CSI.Description: Sets text attributes like bold, underline, colors

CSI.Name: Restore Cursor Position
CSI.Description: Restores the cursor to the last saved position

CSI.Name: Set Mode
CSI.Description: Activates one or more PT200 modes

CSI.Name: Reset Mode
CSI.Description: Inactivates one or more PT200 modes

CSI.Name: Set Mode
CSI.Description: Activates one or more PT200 modes

CSI.Name: Reset Mode
CSI.Description: Inactivates one or more PT200 modes
